channel.title: What's the most OP scum ability?
channel.description:
Throughout all of Throne of Lies history (not forum of lies) in your opinion what is the most broken scum ability that has ever existed and why?
Don't count Evil King for these purposes because EK has inherent OP qualities that make it a boring answer.
If the ability is a Killing ability I would also be curious about the most OP non-killing scum ability specifically as well.

item.title: What's the most OP scum ability?
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
It was due to a bug, but I feel like infinite-bomb Sorc deserves a mention

Read full topic
item.source: What's the most OP scum ability?

item.title: What's the most OP scum ability?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
No. Current mindwarp will give invests framed results but wont frame targets.

Old mindwarp will give flipped results. Meaning that an invest will see scum as NS and non-scum as scum. But also effects non-invests, such as making butler think that the target was immune when they weren’t, or making the physician think their target was attacked.

Read full topic
item.source: What's the most OP scum ability?

item.title: What's the most OP scum ability?
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
@NuclearBurrito Can’t Mindwarp target invests to give them Framed results? As well as Frame targets?

Read full topic
